name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Memini - Remember Stuff That Matters to You

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Memini - Remember Stuff That Matters to You

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Many studies have proven that spaced repetition is the most effective and efficient learning technique.
Memini lets you highlight important parts of your reading and ensures that you re-read them just in the right moment.
